meaningMnemonic: You see <radical>twenty</radical> <radical>slide</radical>s lined up like a <kanji>grid</kanji>. You don't know who put them here, but they almost look like the grid paper you do your maths homework in. But who would use a slide as grid paper?
readingMnemonic: As you stare at the slide <kanji>grid</kanji> you see some people come out and overhear them talk about their mass <reading>maths</reading> (ます) tournament happening later today. Oohhh it IS a giant grid. And they're going to use it to do maths later!
